summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5545 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 31, Sarah A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 9th Avenue and Terry Avenue, from Pike Street to Pine Street; by filling and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 71531, as amended by Ordinance No. 72057, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
